Reviews.Title: used laptop with windows XP
Reviews.Author: reugenen
Reviews.Content: Needed an XP machine or toss existing software.When machine arrived it had something wrong with it.It tended to wander off and seemed unresponsive.I ran a good antivirus, removed all the "personal data" from "gordon's computer turned off the WiFi and disconnected from internet.and the machine runs fine.I download the antivirus once a month and I currently have no issues with this machine.

ProductInfo.Features:
Operating System: Microsoft Windows XP Professional
Integrated Features: Stereo speakers, wireless LAN antenna, ThinkLight
ProductInfo.Name: Lenovo ThinkPad R60 9457 - Core Duo T2300E / 1.66 GHz - Centrino Duo - RAM 512 MB - HDD 60 GB - CD-RW / DVD - GMA 950 - Gigabit Ethernet - WLAN : 802.11a/b/g - TPM - Win XP Pro - 15" TFT 1024 x 768 ( XGA ) - black - Microsoft Office Ready
